title: Elizabeth Jane Howard - (All Change +The Light Years) Epub,Mobi
description:
Elizabeth Jane Howard - (All Change +The Light Years) Epub,Mobi



The Light Years: Cazalet Chronicles Book 1

Book Description
Release Date: 7 Nov 2013 | Series: Cazalet Chronicles (Book 1)

Home Place, Sussex, 1937. The English family at home . . .

For two unforgettable summers they gathered together, safe from the advancing storm clouds of war. In the heart of the Sussex countryside these were still sunlit days of childish games, lavish family meals and picnics on the beach.
Three generations of the Cazalet family. Their relatives, their children and their servants - and the fascinating triangle of their affairs . . .
The Light Years is the first volume in The Cazalet Chronicles. The next novel in the series is Marking Time.



All Change

Book Description
Release Date: 7 Nov 2013 | Series: Cazalet Chronicles (Book 5)

It is the 1950s and as the Duchy, the CazaletsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ beloved matriarch, dies, she takes with her the last remnants of a disappearing world Ã¢â‚¬â€œ of houses with servants, of class and tradition Ã¢â‚¬â€œ in which the Cazalets have thrived.
Louise, now divorced, becomes entangled in a painful affair; while Polly and Clary must balance marriage and motherhood with their own ideas and ambitions.
Hugh and Edward, now in their sixties, are feeling ill-equipped for this modern world; while Villy, long abandoned by her husband, must at last learn to live independently. But it is Rachel, who has always lived for others, who will face her greatest challenges yet . . .
Events converge at Christmas; as a new generation of Cazalets descend on Home Place. Only one thing is certain: nothing will ever be the same again.

Read from the beginning of the series: The Light Years, Marking Time, Casting Off and Confusion.
